website_summaries.verdict: These gloves have shock-absorbing foam padding, but are better at protecting from road vibration than cuts and scrapes from falls.
pros: Shock-absorbing elastic 8mm foam padding on the palms
Foam helps cut down road vibration and relieve hand fatigue
Come in a variety of colors and sizes
cons: Too slippery to use with hand rims for self-propelled wheel chairs

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a new bike rider
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year old niece just learned to ride a bike. I knew if she fell over or crashed, she'd be okay as long as there weren't scrapes and blood. She didn't need those super hard-shell pads, just something to protect her palms if she crashed. And crash she did a few times while wearing them, with no injury. They are comfortable and easy to get off and on. Totally worth the price since she was able to get up and dust off without injury as she was learning to make that sharp, downhill left turn (it took two crashes before she figured it out).
customer_reviews.author: TRC

customer_reviews.title: Must return
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful gloves at a nice price! Nice looking. But they aren't functional for my mountain biking purposes. Not safe. They are super thin slippery spandex on top which is not a big deal especially if you don't need them for warmth but the underside has only thin padding, worst of all it is slippery. Especially the thumbs from that spandex. I need to have good grip on my handlebars so can't risk wearing these thin gloves. They are good looking but not worth a broken collar bone. Size: I have kind of skinny hands with long fingers and the medium fit fine.
customer_reviews.author: Aliasa

customer_reviews.title: Love these (adult sizing, not kids)!
customer_reviews.text: I originally ordered these for my 8 yr old daughter, since the description said " children" in it. However, these are adult sizing! I'm a fit 5'8" and the medium fit me great. I think they have more padding than some of the well known biking brands gloves. I would purchase another pair! Also love the strings in between the fingers to help pull them off when you are all sweaty.
customer_reviews.author: kktooth

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cycling gloves for the price
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves - perfect fit, very comfortable and easy to get on and off. They're soft, padded well, and are cute. I wear them for mountain biking, and they are flexible and they don't get in the way of handlebar grip. I've washed them several times, and they are holding up well. I definitely recommend these gloves, and will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Martin

customer_reviews.title: Look cool and work great
customer_reviews.text: My daughter and I are avid bicyclers, I have a large pair and she has a small pair of these gloves. They look cool, feel great and she loves them. I had a hard fall with my gloves on and used my hands to catch myself on the asphalt. They totally saved my hands from getting road rash and they did not tear apart or get holes. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Joshua G.

customer_reviews.title: Look Nice, Perform Terribly.
customer_reviews.text: I rode down the street less than a 1/4 mile and the stitching here the index finger is located blew out and started coming undone. I've sent them back and wouldn't recommend this brand to anyone. They look cool though, but at a cost of not holding up.
customer_reviews.author: K Sweeten

customer_reviews.title: From 30 degrees to 75 degrees
customer_reviews.text: These are my 4th pair Including a backup pair I keep. I have ridden in temps down to 30 degrees and up past 75 with my hands staying comfortable. I have given some to friends and that is why I've bought and will keep buying more of these gloves. I run worm as a person and do better than most in cold weather so if you run cold, keep in mind you need to find your temp levels
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Thin & Tight
customer_reviews.text: These sad gloves are tight so order a size up if you're going to get these but I wouldn't if I were you. They are also very thin so after riding for a half hour or so fatigue sets in. We will wear them until the end of the season, if they don't fall apart before hand, and get another pair at Dick's or Walmart. Things like these are bad to buy online.
customer_reviews.author: MiG-15

customer_reviews.title: Comfy!
customer_reviews.text: TIP: Use the size chart, it's accurate. I would have normally went with a medium, but I measured my hand and saw it recommended a large which fits perfectly! Super comfy, lots of padding, beautiful on.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Sisley

customer_reviews.title: Great Product will purchase again
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product and highly recommend it. However, be aware that if you have small hands, I would recommend ordering 2 different sizes to find the right fit. I have small hands and the small is looser than what I want and that’s only because the velcro strap isn’t log enough for me to tighten the glove to my hand correctly. But I love this product and when it’s time to replace my gloves I will go with this product again.
customer_reviews.author: ToniB

customer_reviews.title: Good quality product and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my daughter for her birthday to go to an outdoor Ropes Course. These worked perfectly! She said that they were comfortable and the Palms are padded. She has even worn them to school several times just because. she also likes using them at the playground for things like monkey bars.
customer_reviews.author: Michael B.

customer_reviews.title: favorite gloves EVER
customer_reviews.text: I have bought 4 pairs now and will continue to buy them as long as the quality stays true. They are my absolute favorite biking gloves. I wear them for both Mountain and street riding. Super comfortable and i love the padding.
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Padding good with hiking poles.
customer_reviews.text: I'm using these gloves with hiking poles, and the extra padding makes quite a difference with my older hands. The flowers added a touch of whimsy, and the little pull strips make them much easier to remove from my hands.
customer_reviews.author: GrandmafromTX

customer_reviews.title: Little pulls are awesome for removing gloves easily
customer_reviews.text: These gloves have good padding, bright colors and little straps for pulling off. My old gloves didn't have that, and I've never seen this on a bike glove before but it works perfectly for getting the gloves off so much more easily! (especially when they are sweaty)
customer_reviews.author: Karla D.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and functional gloves.
customer_reviews.text: They are very comfortable for my daughter. She can easily get them off and on. You can feel the cushioning inside the gloves. She said that her fingers hurt less on her racing bike when changing gears or after cycling for many miles.
customer_reviews.author: Respice Finem

customer_reviews.title: I love the Anser 2130042 Cycling Gloves Great value
customer_reviews.text: I love the Anser 2130042 Cycling Gloves Very comfortable, easy to remove thanks to the straps on fingers, I went with medium, my palm measured 3.3", the fit is perfect. The Anser 2130042 Cycling Gloves are better than gloves I have paid a lot more for .
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Style and Comfort
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of these gloves I have bought. I bought a pair last year and replaced them with the same. That is good advertising in itself. They are snug at first, around the fingers, especially after a long ride. They do loosed up over time. I wear a size large or and 8 ring size.
customer_reviews.author: rlw257271

customer_reviews.title: Great Gloves for Spin Classes!
customer_reviews.text: These are great gloves for my Spin classes. They fit well. They have good padding. The black string loops you see help you pull off the gloves with ease. I thought the loops might bother me, but they don't at all. They are also cute! I highly recommend these cycling gloves for the budget minded Spinner.
customer_reviews.author: Bunny Shawe

customer_reviews.title: Returning
customer_reviews.text: I received these gloves 3 days ago and only have worn them twice. I drive 8 -10 hours daily. Although they look nice and I have gotten plenty of compliments the material is cheap. They are already snagging and tearing up. I do not recommend buying these at all. Spend more money and get better quality.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Easy off
customer_reviews.text: Biking gloves are a pain in the arse to take off, these are great.......they have little loops to grab onto and get them off in one fell swoop. Helpful that they are also comfy and lightweight. Recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: sallyn

customer_reviews.title: I really like the Hawaiian motif
customer_reviews.text: I bought a couple of pairs of these gloves a few months ago for spin class. I really like the Hawaiian motif, they are easy to remove with the finger loops and they fit nicely. I liked them so much that I just bought another 2 pair!!
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Fingertips Not Cell Phone Compatible
customer_reviews.text: The fingertips are NOT cell phone compatible, which is such a bummer. These gloves are comfortable, light, breathable and padded. Just disappointed with the fingertips.
customer_reviews.author: MtnMan

customer_reviews.title: Not for Children!
customer_reviews.text: The product description inaccurate. I bought a small for my 8 year old but it fits me perfectly instead. It's comfortable but I don't need another one.
customer_reviews.author: leeSS

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves for commuting by bike
customer_reviews.text: These are super cute and comfortable, perfect amount of padding. I commute about 1hr each way by bicycle to work a few times a week. These dry fast so they're good to go for the ride home. I've been wearing them for about 2 months now, no negatives to report.
customer_reviews.author: Eloise

customer_reviews.title: color is way off
customer_reviews.text: color is way off. look at photos of the 'pink' fingerless gloves & the 'pink' full finger gloves. I wanted pink so I ordered the fingerless, cuz the full finger gloves look red to me. well the fingerless gloves are red just like the full finger ones. I will return and try another brand.
customer_reviews.author: Levi

customer_reviews.title: These biking gloves are great, they fit as expected and make your ride ...
customer_reviews.text: These biking gloves are great, they fit as expected and make your ride much more comfortable, the biggest thing is the ease of removing them afterwards, the finger pulls are fabulous and color and appearance is very nice, have a pair for my wife and 2 pair for myself, u won't go wrong for value or look or comfort
customer_reviews.author: Dwayne F.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice kids biking gloves.  Daughter 7.5 years old fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.text: Daughter thinks they are cute and they fit perfectly. They are a neoprene type fabric on the floral side and a soft leather with gel pads on the palm side of the glove. They have pull off loops as well so if the kids hands get sweaty they can still get them off without help. the velcro strap works as you would expect.
customer_reviews.author: Jason M. Eiting

customer_reviews.title: Functional. Comfortable. Great price
customer_reviews.text: Great product. I like the pull strings for easy removal of gloves after riding. Craftsmanship is fine. Functional and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy🌼

customer_reviews.title: Great pair of gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves work great either biking or working out. Cushion padding light weight to breath. Bought my first pair three years ago and liked them so much o purchased again
customer_reviews.author: LisaMarie

customer_reviews.title: Great mountain bike gloves for kids
customer_reviews.text: Got these for a 11 yo boy (wears a size 10-12 shirt). They were a little big, but I appreciate the room for growth. I am impressed by the thick cushion and pull tabs, which make getting the gloves off a breeze. He's used them several times mountain biking and mentioned how much more comfortable his hands are.
customer_reviews.author: Anthem76

customer_reviews.title: Great fit and padding is good
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the gloves. They are pretty but very comfortable. The padding in the palms is just the right amount. I just bought one pair to try them out but will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Garrison

customer_reviews.title: Good for me
customer_reviews.text: I pedal around on my bike. These gloves are great. Just enough for leisure rides
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, colorful & well made. Easy to remove! Trendy. I use for golf and bike riding.
customer_reviews.text: Next time I golf will be using these. So easy to remove and very colorful. Enjoying them a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Probably one of the best pair of fitting gloves I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I typically wear a medium sized glove and ordered a large based on the sizing chart and reviews. Probably one of the best pair of fitting gloves I've owned, quality seems great, padding is awesome! Matches my neon green bike accents perfectly too!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald Livigni

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great, the little loops make them so easy to pull off.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Puckett

customer_reviews.title: looks good and feels good; finger touch screen responsive
customer_reviews.text: I own several gloves for biking and i needed replacements for the summer weather and these looks good and feels good in the hands and fits so well; and the finger touch screens is responsive.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!
customer_reviews.text: I cycle over 100 miles weekly and these gloves are fantastic for hot days. They offer plenty of grip and cushioning and breathe very well.
customer_reviews.author: max

customer_reviews.title: I ride 7 days a week for fun and commuting—-these are comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I ride 7 days a week for fun and commuting—-these are comfortable, breathable and after a couples weeks, just slightly dirty on the palms from my handle bars. I love the skinny straps between the fingers that allow you to pull them off quickly without them turning inside out! Would buy again :)
customer_reviews.author: lisa y. mendez

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable glove.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear, fits well and seems to be constructed for durability. I would probably get another pair. The price wasn’t bad either
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for you buck
customer_reviews.text: Fit great, good breathable material on top. Only used on a few rides so we will see if the last but can’t be any worse than the Fox gloves I bought that the seems are coming apart after 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Hayes

customer_reviews.title: These are soft, pretty, and durable.
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great to keep your hands from getting blistered.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and functional
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these gloves as a gift for my daughter who is a cyclist. They are sturdy with adequate padding and they have little tabs to help with pulling the glove off when done cycling. They are also very pretty. I will definitely purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Color was great, the fit was reasonable
customer_reviews.text: Color was great, the fit was reasonable, daughter loved them but the stitching has already started coming out. Lightly used by a 7 yo girl. Disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Greg Parker

customer_reviews.title: But the good news are the gloves are good quality with nice ...
customer_reviews.text: The description is misguiding. I ordered S size. This is the adult S size - exactly the same I wear. Way too large for my 5 y.o. But the good news are the gloves are good quality with nice padding. That's why I'm keeping them, kids grow fast.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great for adults too!
customer_reviews.text: I am an adult on the small side, with small hands (would probably wear a small or xs in womens). These fit me perfectly, very comfortable and look high quality. Very cute, nice amount of padding.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Favorite biking gloves ever!
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves! They are so cute, and I get tons of compliments. I will definitely buy another pair when these wear out. The pattern is bright, colorful, and just as pictured. The padding on the palms is just right. I love the loops to take the gloves off. My favorite pair of biking gloves by far!!
customer_reviews.author: CM

customer_reviews.title: Too big
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, but XS for child is like a small women’s—will not fit our 7 yr daughter. Her sister has a perfect fitting pair and thought this would the same
customer_reviews.author: M. Wei

customer_reviews.title: riding gloves for cycling
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are really nice. Kind of warm for hot summer. I will use them anytime I use my mountain bike. good quality
customer_reviews.author: isRabel

customer_reviews.title: My wife liked them. She really liked the color and design
customer_reviews.text: My wife liked them. She really liked the color and design. Only thing she wished they had were gel in the palms instead of foam.
customer_reviews.author: K&K

customer_reviews.title: Good for wheelchair users, runs a little large
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot better than the half finger gloves I had before. They are a bit long in the fingers, but they feel good and come on and off easily.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Rajchart

customer_reviews.title: Cyling Gloves
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are awesome! I liked them so much, the others ones are 3 years old and decided to ordered a another pair. The strings on the gloves make real easy to get on and off
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Really good in warmer weather, not so good in cold
customer_reviews.text: Stylish and well-fitting but in Colder Weather they're not great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again
customer_reviews.text: This have been good quality and I really like them.
customer_reviews.author: Christina Driver

customer_reviews.title: I wanted a pair that were easily recognizable as mine
customer_reviews.text: I bought these "women's" gloves because I have a tendency to leave my things behind. I wanted a pair that were easily recognizable as mine. The only problem I have with them is they retain bad odors which very well may be because of the hands that are in them. I love these gloves. I have about six pairs now. I wear them for road, mtb, and gravel.
customer_reviews.author: fred

customer_reviews.title: Look and fit great.
customer_reviews.text: Fit great and are of very good quality. Used them as batting glove for my 8 year old daughter and she loved them.
customer_reviews.author: RM

customer_reviews.title: Good for 12-year old
customer_reviews.text: My 12 year-old daughter loves these. They are well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Kara C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice basic cycling gloves, but check the size chart
customer_reviews.text: Check the size chart, these aren't US adult sizes. These are great cycling gloves though. I've had no hand soreness, red spots, or blisters with these. The loops make them easy to remove as well.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C.

customer_reviews.title: good quality
customer_reviews.text: it has good quality and I like. I live in LA and I used them for about 10 times up to now and very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Shefteh

customer_reviews.title: love the design/colors BUT Loops are a hazard from my ...
customer_reviews.text: love the design/colors BUT Loops are a hazard from my experience. caught them in end-bar shifters and couldn't get hands up to squeeze brakes. CUT THE LOOPS.
customer_reviews.author: lucinda

customer_reviews.title: SIZE???
customer_reviews.text: Cute - but tough to estimate the size you need. I usually wear women's small - med but ordered extra large because they seemed to be in kids sizes. I'm returning for size medium.
customer_reviews.author: Donna Omar

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and great value for the price. Just a little bit loose.
customer_reviews.author: Sally Drake

customer_reviews.title: Amazing gloves. They feel like they were custom made ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing gloves. They feel like they were custom made for me. Easy to put on and, thankfully, easy to get off. I LOVE these gloves!!
customer_reviews.author: G. Gerard

customer_reviews.title: Nice and soft feel to it
customer_reviews.text: "THIS IS A CHILD GLOVES" Bought in error. Nice and soft feel to it.
customer_reviews.author: John J. King, Jr

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality and the small hooks design is very smart!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Car Gloves
customer_reviews.text: Perfect - leaving fintertips free so able to work with contgrols. Great for keeping steering wheel clean. Will definitely buy a replacement when time comes. Could be good gift
customer_reviews.author: JEnnifer Sooy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit, great quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality glove overall. Bought for my 7-year old who's built like a 10 year old. Bought the small size and they were a perfect fit. I may pick up a pair of these for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Evmansmama

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot, very comfortable, more so than my Pearl Izumi gloves actually.
customer_reviews.author: SF

customer_reviews.title: No Fade In the Pink Like Photo!!
customer_reviews.text: There is no fade anywhere in the gloves. It is all one shade of hot pink. the pink doesn't fade out like the photo. Fits me perfect and I cant wait to use them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were smaller, the finger height is so long my little can use them well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: love the little loops for easy-off
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly luxe gloves for the price! Fits very well, love the little loops for easy-off.The padding is really nice. I'm very glad I got these. Have also used them for odd tasks around the house when hand protection was appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Ash K

customer_reviews.title: Fit fine, look cute!
customer_reviews.text: Nice, inexpensive cycling gloves that are cute as can be! Comfy stylin' hands!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good gloves
customer_reviews.text: Well made and colorful kids bike gloves. Fit my eight year old nicely. Much nicer than the ones that come with the knee pad sets.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle from the UP

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves
customer_reviews.text: I love the gloves. I used them on a recent bike ride and did not have any problems with comfort or fit. They also matched my outfit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Arnetta

customer_reviews.title: Not for wheelchair
customer_reviews.text: Not for wheelchair use. The "leather" is to smooth and slides across the hand rims so you can't get a good grip. Needs to have grippers on the palm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfy & practical
customer_reviews.text: Comfy & practical gloves that I use for biking and kayaking.
customer_reviews.author: The French Mom

customer_reviews.title: Nice gloves for sport.
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and good price. They have different varieties of colors. Arrived right on time as was scheduled.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Feklistova

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It's better than the pair I bought at a bike shop for $45.
customer_reviews.author: HappyShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and sturdy gloves. These have held up crashing in the woods and on the road. No tears and unharmed hands.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No sweaty palms
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are great. My hands do not sweat - but I probably should have bought the next size up. They fit the hand perfectly but my wrist is a little tight. They just run a little smaller than my other gloves.
customer_reviews.author: tfam

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love them - my hand go numb when riding - this provided a little extra cushion.
customer_reviews.author: Fawn S. Feury

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my daughter who uses them for pushing her ...
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for my daughter who uses them for pushing her wheelchair. She loves them. Great for going down hill in her chair and protecting her hands.
customer_reviews.author: jason costa

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These gloves are so pretty! Great fit and I've received many compliments. Definitely recommend them for biking attire.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good item. Everything as described.
customer_reviews.text: Kid loves them. They seem well made and so far (2 months since purchase) they haven't shown any defect.
customer_reviews.author: TheOnesWithTheBoxers

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It look so cool and comfortable, I use it right away the day I received it.
customer_reviews.author: E. Cheung

customer_reviews.title: Love these.gloves!
customer_reviews.text: Love.these.gloves! They fit great, are easy to put on and take off, padding is good without being too much.
customer_reviews.author: H. Farris

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty. They are fine for short rides. Not much padding, so would not use on a long ride.
customer_reviews.author: tammy erskine

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Cute and comfy. I plan to use these on the Katy trail in the fall.
customer_reviews.author: Amy F.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these gloves for bike riding! perfect fit, cute and stylish
customer_reviews.author: Valerie DeFoor

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: These were already unraveling before my boys put them on. Poorly made . Not worth the money .
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D

customer_reviews.title: I might by another pair soon.
customer_reviews.text: My favorite color I blue. Easy on and easy off; a perfect fit; great price:)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Get these from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: Well made and will hold up for at least a few years. Saw them on another website for $40. Great deal on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Linda M. Romeo

customer_reviews.title: Soft comfortable bike gloves
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable. The pull tabs at the fingers make removal quick and easy!
customer_reviews.author: Barbara N.

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality! exaclty what we needed.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived fast, nice quality! very cute and the loops are a great addition!!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, good fit
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these gloves for riding bicycles and scooter. Pretty, good fit, and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Zhang

customer_reviews.title: Not dissapointed
customer_reviews.text: OK product. Worth the cost. Arrived as expected with good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Enjoying my cycling gloves not only for biking but outdoor activities and walking the dogs in the early morning.
customer_reviews.author: Lindy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality with lots of padding
customer_reviews.text: Very cute. Good quality with lots of padding. Runs larger than other brands of gloves.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara  Miller

customer_reviews.title: great gloves
customer_reviews.text: Colors are beautiful, bought a size large and they fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful biking gloves
customer_reviews.text: Love these gloves! In fact this is the 2nd time I am purchasing them!!
customer_reviews.author: Kamenna Lee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable - just the right amount of cushioning, I love the easy-off pulls.
customer_reviews.author: Carol May

product_meta.title: Anser 2130042 Riding Gloves Cycling Gloves Breathable Bike Gloves Bicycle Gloves Sport Gloves for Children or Women
feature_bullets: Lycra (upper) material : stretchable and breathable,conforms to the hand's shape and keep your hands cool
Light and soft, so it feels natural and comfortable fit
Shock-absorbing elastic 8mm foam padding on the palms,helps to cut down road vibration and relieve hand fatigue,provide a comfortable fit for long rides
